numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that a larger portion of the younger generation is optimistic.
2. I noticed that a larger portion of the older generation is not optimistic.
3. I wonder why everyone in Indonesia is optimistic.
4. I wonder why the people in Mali are pessimistic.
7. Our optimism could keep us from giving up on the Earth.
8. If we think that this is going nowhere, then we will not try to save our planet.
9. The graph tries to show something.
10. The graph tries to show that younger generations are more prepared to deal with the current turmoil.
11. The graph tries to show that younger generations have more optimism.
12. The title of the graph is: Optimism V. Age.
